step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Nice movement! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together as you roll them back and down.
Great job completing the first rep! Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back.
Second rep starting well. Ensure your shoulders are moving in a smooth circle.
Excellent control! Try to make the circular motion a bit larger to maximize the stretch.
Fantastic finish! You've completed the exercise with good form and mobility.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to keep your movements smooth and controlled, squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Breathing deeply during the backward motion will help improve your results.
